description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Rubble Muddle - An addictive puzzle game. Sift through the rubble, bag the Jewels and blow up the Rocks. Clear the required items before the time runs out and run to the next level...or stay behind to clear the whole level if you dare.
description.short: Rubble Muddle - An addictive puzzle game. Sift through the rubble, bag the Jewels and blow up the Rocks. Clear the required items before the time runs out and run to the next level...or stay behind to clear the whole level if you dare.
